takeaways: Springfield SD 19 serves approximately 8,000+ students across 21 schools from pre-kindergarten through grade 12.
The district covers a wide geographic area including Springfield, Goshen, Mohawk, Walterville, and Marcola in Lane County.
The superintendent is the chief executive of the district and reports directly to the board — not to individual members.
Understanding the district's size, structure, and community context is foundational to effective board service.
